Text.Page:
Prefect Baraz needs reinforcements! The situation's unclear, so take caution. Remember, Dragonfall's safety is paramount.

Head out to Dakonan Overwatch and help him out. Take the field!

I do need help, but for Amena Quatla, not the overwatch.

Khulil asked for anyone I could spare. I've got no one, so I sent word to Dragonfall.

The sikandaris are behind the disappearancesâ€”they're sacrificing our people to awaken Sikander. Get to Crimson Hammer Camp and help Khulil!
Baraz sent you? Great! I'll take all the help I can get. It's time to knuckle down and take the fight to the sikandaris!
